name: Endless runner (Dzhon)
description:
Simple runner that i did for Mini Jam 90

Space - Jump

Illusions: 

- Transparent race

- Never respawn (that is why i called it endless)

- Two camera modifier (like an optical illusion lol)

idk legit this illusions or not, but this is what i did

Unfortunately, I don't have enough time to add some sounds

It took me about 10 hours (fastest game i've ever made)

(also this is my first 3d game)
